00027 #ifndef MSQ_PATCH_ITERATOR_CPP
00028 #define MSQ_PATCH_ITERATOR_CPP
00029 
00030 #include "PatchIterator.hpp"
00031 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00032 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00035 
00036 bool PatchIterator::get_next_patch( PatchData& pd, MsqError& err )
00037 {
00038   if (!patches.size()) {
00039     if (pd.get_mesh() != patchSet->get_mesh()) {
00040       if (pd.get_mesh() == 0)
00041         pd.set_mesh( patchSet->get_mesh() );
00042       else if(patchSet->get_mesh() == 0)
00043         patchSet->set_mesh( pd.get_mesh() );
00044       else {
00045         MSQ_SETERR(err)("PatchSet and PatchData do not share the same Mesh instance.",
00046                         MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00047         return false;
00048       }
00049     }
00050     patchSet->get_patch_handles( patches, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00051     current = patches.begin();
00052   } 
00053   
00054   if (current == patches.end())
00055     return false;
00056   
00057   patchSet->get_patch( *current, elems, verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00058   pd.set_mesh_entities( elems, verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00059   ++current;
00060   return true;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void PatchIterator::reset()
00064 {
00065   current = patches.begin();
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 } // namespace Mesquite
00070 
00071 #endif
